attributes.action: continue the Surrey YMCAs funding for projects.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In April Millennium Volunteers will change to v. V are a charity funded by the 
government who award funding to certain volunteering organizations. Whilst they have given Surrey MV certain funding they have not awarded funding for projects something which is incredibly valuable to volunteers and the community including Skip Art, Window Art, etc. We would be very grateful if you could sign this petition in support of them reconsidering their decision. Thank you. Team MV

rejection.details: It is impossible to understand the relationship between the Government, the charities you mention and the YMCA.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
